author: mariadalfonso
body:
This PR remove hard coded value for Sample Of Interest and Number of Time slices.

Target for next year release (in case HCAL want to reduce the nTS from 10 and re-adjust the sample of interest currently defined as TS=4) 

Expected changes in run1 data for the recHits affected by the QPLL problems
/afs/cern.ch/user/a/abdullin/public/3d_QPLL_HcalRecoParams/QPLL+LBV_channels.txt
title: Method 2,3: generalize the use of the SOI and nTS
